A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After I have sat on this for a day\, I like it even less. They basically took the Force Awakens and made it worthless. In the overall plot\, only one significant thing happened in 150 minutes. Bad guys built up in Force Awakens with mystery are easily killed off with relative ease. Luke’s performance was pointless\, Leia suddenly uses the force to keep from dying...a dark power\, and that is just the tip of the iceberg. Comedy is good but seriously the opening sequence wasn’t funny. Degrading Hux does not add to his character it destroys it. Poe was a jerk and Finn’s plot line was pointless. Maybe IX adds to the plot significance but as it stands today\, I’d rather watch the Phantom Menace than this hot mess.
